subject: Philosophy
title: Living According to Nature
description: A quick win: understand Living According to Nature.

hook.text: Stoics said the goal of life is to live according to nature. But what does that actually mean?

buildup.text: It doesn't mean sleeping outside. It means using your uniquely human gift: rational thought.

discovery.text: Animals follow instinct. Humans can reason about their choices. Living naturally means living rationally.

twist.text: It also means accepting your role in the larger whole â€” family, society, cosmos. You're part of a web.

climax.text: Living according to nature is living with reason, virtue, and acceptance of your place in the world.

punchline.text: Nature gave you reason. Use it.

quiz.question: What did Stoics mean by 'living according to nature'?
options: Using reason and virtue to guide your life
